content: Man, you can't heave a dead cat in Georgia, without hitting a lodge. There are lodges all over! I can send you the website for the Grand Lodge of Georgia. The Grand Secretary has assisted me a couple of times in helping prospective Masons to find lodges. Please PM or email me, with your name and contact numbers, and I will get you to a lodge. Welcome to Freemasonry!
